H0.text: Which golf club is designed to hit the ball the furthest distance. Fairway Wood

H1.text: Which golf club is designed to hit the ball the furthest distance. Hybrid

H2.text: Which golf club is designed to hit the ball the furthest distance. Long Iron

H3.text: Which golf club is designed to hit the ball the furthest distance. Driver

A4.text: Drivers with even larger club-head volumes are available for long-drive competitions and informal games.

A5.text: Long irons are notoriously difficult to hit well.
